```lisp
['(:action defend
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?threat - object ?location - location ?vessel - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (at ?agent ?vessel)
                  (threat-present ?threat ?location)
                  (aware-of-threat ?agent)
                  (vessel_location ?vessel in_open_water)
                 )
  :effect (and
           (defending ?agent ?vessel)
           (not (threat-attacking ?agent))
          )
)',

'(:action attack
  :parameters (?attacker - agent ?target - agent ?location - location)
  :precondition (and 
                  (engaged ?attacker ?target ?location)
                  (threat-present ?target ?location)
                )
  :effect (and 
            (threat-retreating ?target ?location)
            (not (attacking ?target ?attacker))
          )
)',

'(:action attack_ship
  :parameters (?person - agent ?ship - object)
  :precondition (and
                   (on_board ?person ?ship)
                   (not (damaged ?ship))
                 )
  :effect (damaged ?ship)
)',

'(:action make
  :parameters (?actor - agent ?target - object)
  :precondition (and
                   (available ?actor)
                   (not (transformed ?target))
                 )
  :effect (and
             (transformed ?target)
             (not (original_state ?target))
          )
)',

'(:action block
  :parameters (?entity - object ?obstacle - object ?zone - area)
  :precondition (and
                (object_location ?obstacle in_zone ?zone)
                (object_location ?entity in_different_zone ?zone)
                (not (object_deterred ?entity))
               )
  :effect (and
          (object_location ?entity in_zone ?zone)
          (object_deterred ?entity)
         )
)',

'(:action take
  :parameters (?npc - agent ?target - object ?tool - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (near ?target ?npc)
                  (has_tool ?npc ?tool)
                  (not (handled ?npc ?target))
                 )
  :effect (and
           (handled ?npc ?target)
           (target_condition ?target modified)
          )
)']
```
